name: 小糸
trans: ─A Halloween broadcast...

name: 小糸
text:
…………！
ハロウィン、パーティー……！
trans:
…...!
A Halloween Party…!

name: 小糸
trans:
─A-Alright,
Without further ado...

name: 小糸
text:
『ノクチルハロウィンWEB配信』について
何か、意見がある人……！
trans:
On the topic of ‘Noctchill's Online Halloween Broadcast' - 
if anyone has any suggestions please raise your hand!

name: 透
trans:
This is great already,
way to go, Koito.

name: 小糸
trans: Y-You really think so…?

name: 雛菜
trans: Me, me! ♡ Hinana～!

name: 雛菜
text:
ハロウィンだし、
お菓子いっぱい食べたい～！
trans:
Since it's Halloween, 
I want to eat looots of snacks～!

name: 小糸
trans: S-Snacks…!

name: 円香
text: 何？　その程度の意見でいいの？
trans: Huh? Is that all you're gonna say?

name: 雛菜
trans: Ehhh～?

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあお菓子を
ハロウィンぽいのにする～？
trans:
Should we only bring 
Halloween-like snacks then～?

name: 小糸
trans: U-Uh...huh...

name: 小糸
text:
プロデューサーさんは『ファンと一緒に
ハロウィンパーティーをするつもりで』って
trans:
Producer-san did say this party would be 
“a chance to celebrate Halloween together with all our fans”...

name: 小糸
trans: That's what he said but...

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜たちが楽し～くおいし～く
お菓子を食べながらおしゃべりする！
trans:
We should eat yummy sweets and chat together with everyone, 
it'll be tasty AND tons of fun～!

name: 雛菜
trans: Or is that no good～?

name: 円香
text: いいなら、いいんじゃない
trans: If we can make that work, let's do that.

name: 小糸
text:
でも、何を話すかくらいは
考えておいた方がいいんじゃ……
trans:
But if we do something like that, 
we should think of what to say beforehand...

name: 雛菜
trans: Hmm～ I guess so～?

name: 小糸
trans:
─Ah!
I-I've got it!

name: 小糸
text:
事務所に、サイコロあったよね？
お題が書いてあるやつ……！
trans:
You know those dice in the office? 
The ones with the subjects written on them…!

name: 小糸
text:
そ、それをお題にして
おしゃべりするのはどうかな……！
trans:
H-How about we use that 
to decide our conversation topics…!

name: 小糸
text:
何が出るか見ておけば
話したいことも先に考えておけるし……
trans:
If we know what topics will come up, 
that way we can prepare our answers ahead of time...

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
雛菜はそれでいいよ～
trans:
Aha～
Hinana thinks that's a great idea～

name: 小糸
text:
ほ、ほんと……！　
ま、円香ちゃんはどう？
trans:
R-Really…?
W-What do you think, Madoka-chan?

name: 円香
trans: If you're sure then I'm okay with it.

name: 小糸
text:
そ、そっか……！
透ちゃんは？
trans:
G-Got it…!
What about you, Toru-chan?

name: 小糸
trans: U-Um, is it okay with you if we..

name: 小糸
text:
こ、今度のハロウィンの配信、
みんなでお菓子持ち寄って、食べて……
trans:
For this year's Halloween broadcast…
We all bring snacks and eat them together while chatting...

name: 小糸
text:
サイコロのお題でおしゃべりするって案、
なんだけど……
trans:
And we use the dice to decide our conversation topics? 
Something like that...

name: 透
trans: Ahー Sure.

name: 透
trans: Sounds like fun.

name: 透
trans: I'm in.

name: 小糸
text:
そ、そうだよね……！
じゃ、じゃあ決まりね！
trans:
I-It does sound like fun…!
It's settled then!

name: 小糸
text:
お菓子、
ひとりひとつは用意してくること！
trans:
Well then, 
each of us should come prepared with some sweets!

name: 小糸
text:
話すことも
考えてきてください……！
trans:
And please think carefully about 
what you'd like to chat about…!

name: 雛菜
trans: Yes ma'am～!

name: 透
trans: Roger.

name: 円香
trans: ...Pfft, that response was a mess.

name: 小糸
text:
──そ、それでは本日はこれより
飾り付けの作成に入りたいと思います……！
trans:
─M-Moving on to our next topic,
I thought we could start making some decorations today…!

name: 小糸
trans: T-There, all finished…!

name: 透
trans:
*blow*ー...
This is no use.

name: 円香
text:
……雛菜
何するつもりか、バレてるからね
trans:
...Hinana, what are you doing? 
I can see what you're up to, you know.

name: 雛菜
trans: Ehhh～?

name: 小糸
trans: W-Where should I put these up…

name: 小糸
text:
こ、こっちかな……！
そっちかな……！
trans:
M-Maybe here…! 
Or here might be better…!

name: 小糸
text: ……ハロウィンパーティーかぁ……
trans: ...A Halloween party, huh…

name: 小糸
trans: Ehehe…
